main.name: Al Naheen
main.description: A high school kid with a Dream to make a huge change in the world with my Programming skills
main.bio: My name is Al Naheen Ibna Siddique. I'm a Full Stack Web Developer. Currently I'm studying in a high school in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Want to Build & Maintain a huge website...? I have great grip on Front-End ( HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JavaScript, ReactJS, BootStrap... ) & Backend ( Firebase, NodeJS, MongoDb, Django ). Don't just believe my words. Firstly give me a chance and then decide whether you want me or not.

education.description: I have a lot of interest in learning and exploring new things.

work.title: Intern
work.description: I am a ReactJS Developer at Amader Delivery. This is an ecommerce company from where you can buy products online

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.category: Amazon Clone built with ReactJS with User Authentication &  Payment Services

testimonials.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

That Al Naheen is one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is surprising that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be a high school kid and have less job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
